Name: The Statue of Zeus
Caption: A tribute to the king of gods. Put in the discard pile one brown card (Raw goods) of your choice constructed by their opponent. This Wonder is worth 1 Shield and is worth 3 victory points.

Name: The Great Library
Caption: A center of knowledge. Randomly draw 3 progress tokens from the discard pile, choose one, play it and place the others back. This wonder is worth 4 victory points.

Name: The Mausoleum
Caption: A grand tomb. Construct a building of your choice from the discard pile for free. This wonder is worth 2 victory points.

Name: The Great Lighthouse
Caption: A beacon for ships.This Wonder produces one unit of the resources shown (Stone, Clay, or Wood) for you each turn. This wonder is worth 4 victory points

Name: The Colossus
Caption: A bronze giant at the harbor. Gain 2 shields and 3 victory points.

Name: The Circus Maximus
Caption: A grand arena. Gain 3 victory points, 1 shield and put in the discard pile one grey card of your choice constructed by your opponent.

Name: The Sphinx
Caption: A mythical guardian. Gain 6 victory points and play a second turn.

Name: The Hanging Gardens
Caption: Lush gardens in Babylon. Gain 6 coins, 3 victory points, and play a second turn.

Name: Piraeus
Caption: A bustling port. Gain 2 victory points, play a second turn and produce one unit of the resources shown (Papyrus, Glass) each turn

Name: The Temple of Artemis
Caption: A sanctuary for the huntress. Gain 12 coins and play a second turn.

Name: The Appian Way
Caption: Build a road to Rome. Gain 3 coins, 3 victory points, and play a second turn. Your opponent loses 3 coins.
